comments:
When I refactor some code or save a file, both of which contain EUC-JP characters, the following error happens very often.
And I don't know why.

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        at java.nio.Buffer.position(Buffer.java:218)

        at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:952)

I just changed the 'Text file encoding' property of the project from 'Inherited from container(EUC-JP-LINUX)' to 'Other: EUC-JP', and it was fixed.
So I think it's not Eclipse's bug at all.
I'm really sorry to have bothered you with this stupid mistake of mine.
